name: Aonergy Ventures
overview:
The aONErgy Intellectual Property (P) Ltd, IPR arm of aONErgy Ventures, is a global intellectual property & technology Consulting firm with a core competence and business focus on providing intellectual property research and technolgy consultancy services.

We provide patent pre-filing support (prior art search, patentability search, state of art search, patent drafting, patent illustration, and patent proofread) services, Patent litigation support (invality search, freedom to operate search, and infringement search) services, research and analytics (claim charts/product-patent mapping, technology landscape, competitors’s analysis, and white space analysis ) services, filing and prosecution (national phase pct patent filing in India, and office action) services, and other intellectual property registration (trademark/design/copyright) services to our clients.
